name: G & G HK Girl - Fast Drying + Super Shiny Top Coat
description:
G & G HK Girl is a Super Shiny, Fast Drying Top Coat

    Top 10 Reason why Glisten & Glow HK Girl is so loved!

•	 Intense shine - crystal clear formula that applies smoothly, leaving a glass like appearance
•	Fast drying – approx 1-2 minutes often less and your nails will be dry, as time passes it will dry more within 5 minutes or so it’s rock hard! 
•	Durable, long lasting nature – customers boast that manicures last 5-7 days with little to no tip wear or chips. 
•	Holographic polishes love it! – Holos will not dull, in fact they are even intensified 
•	Smoothes and seals glitter polishes – 1-2 coats and glitters are tamed/smooth and without jagged edges sticking up. 
•	Adds extra shine to all nail lacquer – it can make a matte polish or a textured polish shiny. Cremes, jellies, crellies, shimmers, metallics etc are all left with that glossy glass like shine
•	No Shrinkage! – G & G HK Girl top coat doesn’t cause any shrinkage
•	Can be used with nail lacquer that is tacky or dry
•	Even consistency throughout the whole bottle – no extra thickness or gloppyness
•	Nail Art/Nail Stamping friendly – once nail art/stamping is nearly dry it won’t smear or smudge

This Top Coat is 2 Free! (no formaldehyde or formaldehyde resin and no toluene)

If it gets a little thick just add a few drops of nail polish thinner and shake well! 

***Do You Love INDIE POLISHES?***

Check out our favorite indie brands 
Jindie Nail - http://www.jindienails.com
Above The Curve (ATC) - http://abovethecurve.bigcartel.com/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Here's the Rave Reviews
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
YOU MUST READ THIS REVIEW!
http://www.kimberslacquerkorner.com/2013/03/lets-talk-about-top-coats-hk-girl-fast.html

http://www.agirlandherpolish.com/2013/06/sunday-stamping-inspired-by-70s.html
I am taking a minute to include a picture of my all time favorite top coat, HK Girl.  This is the only top coat I use.  My designs never smear, no bubbles and no shrinkage.  There has been a lot of talk about this top coat the past couple weeks and I felt that I needed to add my two cents!  I have been using HK Girl for over a year now and I am 100% loyal to it, nothing else on the market comes close to this top coat!  And I can't forget that the dry time is amazing and there is some serious shine!
I order all my HK Girl from Jill at Glisten & Glow!

http://www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/2012/07/review-hong-kong-girl-top-coat.html
Review: HK Girl Top Coat
I have had the amazing honor of purchasing from  Glisten and Glow a couple of times. Every time has been exceptionally wonderful. Today I have a rave review of HK Girl Topcoat,  G & G has AMAZING customer service, her packages are packed very well, and ships really fast.

This topcoat is amazing. I absolutely love it, I have found myself reaching for it non stop, when I usually reach for my Seche Vite.

It is so great over nail art, it is thick enough so you don't touch the nail polish, but it doesn't get goopy halfway through the bottle like Seche Vite. It is super shiny, dries super fast, and overall I think this is my superhero topcoat. (I just ordered another bottle!)

http://www.loveforlacquer.com/2012/07/glisten-glow-review.html
Last but not least is the coveted HK Girl Top Coat. A MUST HAVE for any polish lover! Throw away your Seche girls because THIS is the holy grail of top coat. Am I the only one who has 3 bottles of this? I keep one in the polish room, the kitchen and the bedroom. Haha! It dries extremely speedy, leaves your nails rock hard and gives them a gorgeous shine! 

I'm so excited to have the huge bottle. Since I found this top coat I've actually thrown away all my other top coats. I also managed to convert a couple friends! Honestly I don't know how more people don't know about HK Girl. Seche would be out of business! - http://www.kimberslacquerkorner.com

Probably I was the last of my friends to try HK Girl. I had tried like 5 different brands of top coats and still my problem was the same, my mani always chip and really fast, I made my own excuses, my hands are in contact with water all the time, my nails are dry and the polish doesn't stick to the nail well, I don't wrap my tips... I gave up and just used what I already have until I decided to try HK Girl because I love Jill and poof!!! 10 days manis were born. This is so amazing I can't believe I can remove my nail polish just because I'm tired of looking at it and not because is half gone by natural causes. Ladies the true polish lover top coat exist nothing is better than HK Girl - Nelly O

 Man HK Girl is BEYOND anything out there. Best stuff I have ever used. I truly will NOT go back to anything else. Seriously no joke...I can go a week before I see even a smidgen of chipping. Before it would be like a day. I can't even say now crazy glass like may nails are!!! - Shanel S.

Wow! Just WOW!! HKG really is the best topcoat! Evvveerrrr!!! I just did my nails. I applied one coat of HKG which took about 2 minutes. I told myself "just for fun", I am going to touch my pinky and see if it's dry, I literally said in my head "wtf!!" (I'm so sorry I just had to share this lol) it was dry!!!! I was so surprised! I didn't even have to use my fast dry spray. So I touched all my nails even the last nail I applied the top coat on. Wow! I don't see any thumbprints! Ahhh ! I will definitely purchase this again! I don't think I'll use any other topcoat, just HKG!!! 

HK top coat is NO FREAKING JOKE. My Floam hasn’t chipped since Friday and my nails are hard as a rock. ♥ – Jess C

HK Top coat is amazing!!!!!!!!!!! – Jess S.

It’s official!!! I am in L O V E with HK Girl top coat!! It’s faster the Seche, super shiny, and it doesn’t smell as bad!! Thank you for introduce us cuz ;) ♥ – Josefina S.

HK Girl topcoat is phenomenal! Super quick drying and the best part is NO shrinkage!!! I can use this with every brand of polish I own and it works great. Thanks G & G for introducing me to this amazing product. By the way, G & G cherry lip balm is so yummy :) – Sara H.

HK Girl made my nails smooth and shiny. My nails would not be the same without you! :) -Mandy R.

I just had the bf use credits to get me my 2nd bottle ;) lol ...i really like the smell of it. and it seriously kept me from denting the HELL out of my mani the other day. really quickly, hardened like a rock ♥   I use it on still wet polish and it hardens it like a rock....few mins it's pretty sturdy, but the longer it goes the harder it gets.- Jess P

This is the best top coat I have ever used! I am so difficult on my nails but they look newly polished with the help of this wonderful product! I don’t need anything else but this! – Mandy R.

I thought nothing could top Seche Vite, I was wrong. I LOVE THIS (HK GIRL)  top coat! It's simply amazing. Dries very fast, very glossy, it even smoothes out nail polish mistakes as well! - Amanda S.

I swear by it (HK GIRL)...seriously it's the only thing I'll use...I wish I had a blog, I'd write you a fabulous review!! - Alischia T  -Owner of  Lacquerhead Polish 


I also won a bottle of HK Girl Top Coat. Thank you so much for introducing me to this!!! I have always been a Seche Vite kind of girl but you’ve changed that! I’m amazed by how quickly it dries, the shine and how well a manicure lasts now! Simply amazing! -Lisa C.

Truly is! I’ve been a Seche girl for years because nothing was nearly as shiny & hard… until HK Girl. I’d been dreading reaching the bottom of my bottle of SV, but not anymore! HK Girl dries faster, is just as shiny and hard (if not harder! WHAT!), and never any drag! I hate having to put on another coat of polish because the top coat ruined it. Never again with this stuff. Best topcoat ever. – Joy B

This is truly the BEST top coat! For the first time in my life my polish lasted for 2 full weeks without chipping or that infamous wearing off on the tips. The shine is amazing!! This topcoat doesn’t only protect your polish, but it also intensifies the color like you wouldn’t believe!! If you want your nails looking like they were just done, GET THIS!! It’s a MUST HAVE!!! – Rachael N.

Photo Credits: www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/
and of course Glisten & Glow

name: G & G Nail + Cuticle Balm
description:
G & G Nail + Cuticle Balm

Our Nail + Cuticle Balm is truly one of a kind! Filled will only the best ingredients! It's not at all greasy! Keeps your nails and cuticles moisturized and looking great. .50 oz size

Product contains: shea butter, jojoba oil, coconut oil, beeswax, sweet almond oil, castor oil, argan oil, vitamin e oil, acai berry botanical extract, grape seed oil, sunflower oil, tea tree oil and fragrance 

In the PRESS: http://www.lacquerologist.com/search/label/hand%20care%2Fnail%20care

The Glisten & Glow Nail and Cuticle Balm in Sangria White Peach smells PHENOMENAL!  I wish I could bathe in it (oh wait...I can!  G&G makes body wash too!).  The ingredient list in this product makes me happy as well: shea butter, jojoba oil, coconut oil, beeswax, sweet almond oil, castor oil, argon oil, vitamin E oil, acai berry botanical extract, grape seed oil, sunflower oil, tea tree oil and fragrance oil.  Such great ingredients for your nails and cuticles!  To see why I love jojoba oil products so much, read my Eponychium and Nail Plate Health post [here]!  Some cuticle balms I have used get really melty with body heat, but this one doesn't, so it doesn't apply super greasy on your fingers (but you also have to work a bit to get a decent amount of product on your nail).  I applied it, rubbed it in, and went on with my day without greasy fingertips!  This product is wonderful for regular daytime use and with the ingredients, I can promise that it will do great things for your nails and eponychium!  The Nail and Cuticle Balm is available [here] for $8.50 (0.5oz).

Winter/Holiday Fragrances

Winter Wonderland - Orange, Cinnamon Leaf, Clove, Cranberry & Baked Vanilla

Dasher’s  Sugar Plums - A mildly spicy, sugary, fruity scent

Comet’s Candy Cane -  Minty Medley (peppermint, wintergreen and spearmint)

Mrs. Claus’s Cranberry Cocktail –  Cranberry delight with a touch of sugar and spice  

Grandma’s Gingerbread Cookies -  Warm gingerbread cookies right from the oven.

Prancer’s Pecan Pie - warm roasted pecans coated in sugar and spice.

Vixen’s Vanilla Snowflake - Sweet, creamy pure vanilla with a buttery top note and a splash of ice

Rudolph’s Red Apple Crisp – Warmed  red apples with a hint of cinnamon and brown sugar

Cupid’s  Cinnaberries - Spicy cinnamon blend with rich berry notes.

Blitzen’s  Brown Sugar  and Cinnamon - Blend of Brown Sugar and Cinnamon

Santa’s  Snowy Minty Hot Chocolate 

Customer Faves!

Sangria White Peach 
Vanilla Honey
Pumpkin Latte

Reviews: 
This is the absolute best cuticle balm I've had the privilege to review! It goes on smooth and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin moisturized and my cuticles looking the best I've ever seen them! As a blogger, acetone damage is a real risk but I can rest assured that this will not only keep my cuticles healthy but also help them look that way in photos! All in all, this is my go-to product to maintain cuticle health and I'm in love with the fragrance, Sangria White Peach--a perfect summer fruity scent! - ColorSutraa - Babi Chatterjee

http://www.lacquerologist.com/2013/08/glisten-glow-nail-and-cuticle-balm-glis.html

http://raindownonmebeauty.blogspot.com/2013/07/glisten-and-glows-nail-cuticle-balm.html

name: Glis-tics Cuticle Oil (roller ball) .37 oz
description:
Glis-tics Cuticle Oil (roller ball) .37 oz

**Don't forget to use the drop down menu for all the fragrance selections**

You'll be getting ONE Glis-tics! :) 

Do you love cuticle oil! Now it comes in an easy to use roller ball style! Help protect your beautiful manicure! Keep those cuticles looking healthy! Must have for nail polish vixens!

Check out this review from GlamTrotter!
http://glamtrotter.com/glisten-glow-glistics/

Photo Credits: GlamTrotter

It’s no secret that I have ridiculously dry skin, but in addition to that my cuticles are ten times as dry. Being a mom of active children my hands get pretty beat up, and I really don’t have a lot of time to dedicate to nail serums and creams.   Over the past few months I have focused on testing a variety of different hand and nail products, and have found one in particular that works wonders for my cuticles and fits my on-the-go lifestyle.   The product is called Glist-Tics Cuticle Oil, from Glisten & Glow.  Glis-Tics are handcrafted of the finest oils, vitamin E, and fragrance.

The blue glass vials are so swank and functional, complete with roller ball for ease of application.  I also love the fact that these are the perfect size for carrying in your clutch, purse, and even your pocket.  As far as the formula goes the consistency of the oil just right. With one swipe of the rollerball it transfers just the right amount of product.  What I love about Glist-Tics compared to other cuticle oils is that the fragrance is completely customizable by the “You”!  Being a fragrance collector I love all of the possibilities and combinations of fragrances that can be purchased.  Glisten and Glow carries over 95+ fragrances to choose from.  When you purchase any Glisten & Glow product, the label may also be customized with your name or text that you’d like at no additional cost.   Glist-Tics retail for $10.50 each for a .37 oz glass roller ball and will last you several months.

I purchased my Glist-Tics in Sangria White Peach, Viva La Juicy, Hawaiian Tropic, and Rosemary & Mint. I have also used my Viva La Juicy Glist-Tics as perfume on my wrists when I was in a pinch and it worked great.  It literally smells just like the Juicy Couture fragrance!  Sangria White Peach is also divine, and being from the South it smells so nostalgic to me.  Hawaiian Tropic transports you directly to a tropical island with its coconut deliciousness.  Rosemary Mint is fresh and is a great choice for folks looking for something a bit less fragrant.

Am I the only one who has 3 bottles of this? I keep one in the polish room, the kitchen and the bedroom. Haha! It dries extremely speedy, leaves your nails rock hard and gives them a gorgeous shine! Please keep in mind Jill does NOT make this top coat. She buys it in bulk and decants it into her own adorable bottles!

I'm so excited to have the huge bottle. Since I found this top coat I've actually thrown away all my other top coats. I also managed to convert a couple friends! Honestly I don't know how more people don't know about HK Girl. Seche would be out of business! - http://www.kimberslacquerkorner.com/

i just absolutely love my HK girl, i cant stop feeling how smooth my nails feel with it. just amazing girl! ty! - Amy Lynn W

Wow! Just WOW!! HKG really is the best topcoat! Evvveerrrr!!! I just did my nails. I applied one coat of HKG which took about 2 minutes. I told myself "just for fun", I am going to touch my pinky and see if it's dry, I literally said in my head "wtf!!" (I'm so sorry I just had to share this lol) it was dry!!!! I was so surprised! I didn't even have to use my fast dry spray. So I touched all my nails even the last nail I applied the top coat on. Wow! I don't see any thumbprints! Ahhh ! I will definitely purchase this again! I don't think I'll use any other topcoat, just HKG!!!

HK Girl topcoat is phenomenal! Super quick drying and the best part is NO shrinkage!!! I can use this with every brand of polish I own and it works great. Thanks G & G for introducing me to this amazing product. By the way, G & G cherry lip balm is so yummy :) – Sara H.

HK Girl made my nails smooth and shiny. My nails would not be the same without you! :) -Mandy R.

This is the best top coat I have ever used! I am so difficult on my nails but they look newly polished with the help of this wonderful product! I don’t need anything else but this! – Mandy R.

I also won a bottle of HK Girl Top Coat. Thank you so much for introducing me to this!!! I have always been a Seche Vite kind of girl but you’ve changed that! I’m amazed by how quickly it dries, the shine and how well a manicure lasts now! Simply amazing! -Lisa C.

name: Glisten & Glow 8 oz. Body Lotion
description:
G & G  8 oz. Body Lotion

**Don't forget to use the drop down menu for all the fragrance selections**

Our BODY LOTION is handmade and whipped to perfection; lotions aren’t thick and sticky and carry a long-lasting fragrance. The lotion absorbs quickly and is never greasy, yet leaves your skin feeling unbelievably silky, soft and smooth and hydrated! It is loaded with moisturizing natural ingredients such as shea butter, botanicals and Vitamin E. Our lotion is perfect for the hands, feet and body!

What don’t our lotions have in them?
Lotions are free of mineral oil, which is a petroleum byproduct that leaves a greasy film on the skin and can clog pores. It is also free of Lanolin, which is a wax derivative of sheep’s wool, and it can cause allergies and clog pores as well. Also the lotion is also free of SD Alcohol which is commonly used in other brands of skin products and can be very drying to the skin!


Choose your fragrance today!

name: Glisten & Glow - 2 oz. Massage Oil
description:
Glisten & Glow 2 oz. Massage Oil

**Don't forget to use the drop down menu for all the fragrance selections**

Our MASSAGE/BODY OIL is a specially blended formula that softens bath water, hydrates dry skin and provides excellent glide for a deep massage. Let the oils moisturize your skin and restores vital nutrients. As it absorbs, the oil leaves skin soft, and carries a long lasting fragrance.  Spice up the passion in your romance using the oils to give your partner a relaxing and pampering massage.  Helps improve circulation; muscle aches, and is a stress reliever.

Made from 100% pure grape seed, sweet almond oil and sunflower oil w. vitamin e oil

Review: http://www.thejediwife.blogspot.com/2013/01/how-about-massage-for-valentines-day.html

Now that January is coming to a close and February is almost here, the channels are packed with commercials for Valentine's Day.  You know what I mean- the men always give their significant other a sparkling new piece of jewelry and the women all swoon over the gesture and their new bauble.  Sure, these commercials are cute, but are they really based on reality? I enjoy a nice sparkly adornment as much as any other woman, but I feel like these commercials put too much pressure on our partners to buy us expensive gifts.  I don't know about you, but I prefer a more intimate and bonding experience with my partner, and I have the perfect solution that is sweet AND won't break the bank.  How about a massage using massage oil that has been customized just for you and your partner?  I know that's what I would want the most!  I have Glisten & Glow to thanks for preparing me for a romantic evening with the hubby.

I've reviewed numerous products already by Glisten & Glow, but I just cannot seem to get enough of this brand!  Jill, the creator and mastermind behind the brand, is a dear friend of mine and always a delight to work with.  Once you select your product, she has over 95 scents to choose from, and Jill is always happy to accomodate special requests.  I've always been very sensitive to smells even before becoming pregnant, and Jill makes sure to use a lighter hand when scenting my products.  Once you have your product and scent selected, Jill will customize the label for you.  Because I wanted to review this for my blog, I asked Jill to use "The Jedi Wife" on my label.

I really enjoy this massage oil!  I'm sure many of you are rolling your eyes at me and saying "Of course you do, you just got a massage!" BUT I was the one massaging the hubby's messed up lower back.  Ha!  I've used several different massage oils and lotions over the years, but I prefer this one.  Many other oils are way too thick for my liking, and my hands feel like a disgusting grease pit after I'm done.  Lotions, even those that are designed for massage, sometimes soak into the skin too quickly and you start to slough off dead skin cells mid-massage: that's definitely not attractive.  I like this massage oil because it is thick enough and doesn't get absorbed too quickly, but it isn't too thick that my hands feel foreign to myself.  Having the ability to choose a scent is an added bonus; I love that I have a massage oil that I enjoy from a quality perspective in a scent that both my husband and I like.  I'd definitely recommend picking up your own customized massage oil from Glisten & Glow and spending the evening either pampering or getting pampered by you favorite Valentine!

Photo Credits: Glisten & Glow 
http://www.thejediwife.blogspot.com/

name: Pink Himalayan Salt Hand Scrub - 4 oz. Jar
description:
1- 4 oz. Jar of Pink Himalayan Salt Hand Scrub
*You pick your fragrance or essential oil* (see the drop down)

How to use: Scoop out approx. a tablespoon of the product into your hands, massage and exfoliate all areas of the hands, and nails for approx 2-3 minutes. Pay special attention to the cuticle area and back of hands. 
Rinse hand of the salt, you will then have a wonderful moisturizer left on your hand, rub it all in esp. to cuticle and nail areas. Let dry!
Some will prefer to then wash hands with soap and water, but the best way for your skin to gain the benefits of the ingredients is to allow the "goodness" to stay on your hands.

Pink Himalayan Salt Hand Scrub
Contains: Pink Himalayan salt, jojoba oil, shea butter, coconut oil, argan oil, castor oil, vitamin e oil, sweet almond oil, acai berry botanical extract, tea tree oil and either fragrance oil or essential oil

Did we just throw these items into a jar and sell em?
NO WAY! Everything has a purpose here. I've been a certified nail tech since 1996 and 
G & G was born as a bath and body products company that’s been in business since 2010. (many of you know us for nail polish) We've spent thousands of hours researching, learning and developing all of our products! (Not to mention learning from some of the biggest and best in this industry) We test all products for anywhere from 3-6 month and most for a longer time period. 

What’s under the LID and WHY!

Pink Himalayan Salt 
- considered one of the purest salts in the world coming from the clean rivers and lakes of the Himalayan Mountains
- acts as an excellent exfoliate, boasting smooths, soft and cleans skin
-  provides relief for skin conditions such as psoraisis and skin rashes.
- natural pink and light red colors from the high mineral and iron content. (organic and kosher)
- acts as an excellent exfoliate, boasting smooths, soft and cleans skin

Jojoba Oil
-Its anti –inflammatory properties reduce the painful swelling and redness that so often accompanies a skin injury and irritation
-Jojoba Oil is so similar to the natural oils that our bodies produce on a regular basis, it’s particularly effective as a moisturizer. It’s easily absorbed and leaves the skin feeling soft and supple
-particularly effective for treating dry skin or helping to create a more youthful appearance for people with aging skin

Shea Butter
 -Aids and prevents wrinkles, fine lines, age spots
Antioxidant
-Deeply moisturizing, skin strengthening and collagen stimulating

Coconut Oil
- coconut oil covers your skin, soothing it of all itchiness and dryness making it smooth and soft. It also provides an extra glow! It not only acts as an antioxidant and skin nourisher, but also increases the self made antioxidant levels in the body.

"Commercial moisturizers contain lots of water, which makes you feel like your skin is being moisturized. But as soon as the water dries, your skin becomes dry again. Also, many commercial brands of moisturizers contain petroleum-based ingredients that can suffocate the skin. In contrast, coconut oil provides deep and real moisture. It helps strengthen underlying tissues and helps remove excessive dead cell on the skin's surface that makes your skin rough and flaky in texture”

Argan Oil
-protects  skin against wrinkles, softens skin
-gives strength to weak and easily breakable nails as well as strengthens the delicate skin at the root of the nail.
-Helps with skin inflammation and clears many skin conditions. Also aids in skin tissue and scar repair (helps heal those little cuts around our nails)

Castor Oil
-great for adding moisture to the skin and bringing back its elasticity.
-works as a good sealant to lock in moisture and smooth dry skin, has the properties to deeply penetrate the skin.
-Acts as a natural nail strengthener

Vitamin E Oil
Yes, we use a 45,000 IU vitamin e oil, which is one of the highest levels  of concentration.
-Helps skin retain its natural moisture content. Is easily absorbed by the epidermis layer of the skin and bring back that natural glow and aid in blood circulation.
-Is a wonderful treatment for dry crackled cuticles. 
-Vitamin E goes below the skin and helps block free radicals that cause wrinkles and pre mature skin aging

Sweet Almond Oil 
–acts as an emollient to soften skin, acts as a humectants to prevent loss of moisture

Acai Berry Botanical Extract
-Anti-Aging Benefits: Regenerative nutrients and antioxidants present in acai berry ensure that the cells on your skin
ability to fight free radicals make acai berry a potent anti-aging aid.
-Reducing corrosion of skin’s protective coating: The ‘phytosterols’ present in acai berry prevents skin cells from dying a premature death and also fends off harmful invaders. Your skin thus gets benefited because of this dual action of acai berry.
-Defends against accumulation of premature wrinkles: The ‘phytosterols’ and ‘anthocyanins’ in acai behave as powerful astringents keeping the skin intact and help protect tissues connecting the skin. An elastic, strong skin looks suppler and wrinkles look less prominent.

Tea Tree Oil
antiviral
antibacterial
antifungal
antiseptic

Fragrance Oil or Essential Oil 
To make it pleasant on the sniffer!

*None medical claims*

name: Glisten & Glow 2 oz. Jellie-Cure Foot Treatment
description:
Glisten & Glow  Jellie – Cure and Dissolve – Cure
**Don't forget to use the drop down menu for all the fragrance selections**

**CHECK OUT THIS REVIEW**

http://thejediwife.blogspot.com/2013/01/my-feet-have-been-slushied.html

Made from crystal mud (an assortment of natural plant extracts), aloe vera, ginseng, fragrance and FD & C coloring.  Jellie – Cure can effectively reduce foot odor and sweating. It will serve to moisten the skin, soften rough calluses and prevent dryness.

How to Use Jellie-Cure: Fill up your personal footbath with hot water (your desired temperature), slowly sprinkle approx ¼ of the 2 oz. jar into the hot water, stir around with your hand. Within a minute or so the Jellie-Cure will start to expand and solidify in your footbath.  Add more water or Jellie-Cure to your desired consistency.   Your footbath should now have a consistency of a Slushie!  Sit back and relax as your feet get pampered! The Jellie-Cure will retain the heat from the water, move your feet around in the footbath and enjoy! You can use this product at the start of your pedicure or toward the end. It’s a personal preference! Don’t forget to use lotion on your feet before your pedicure is done! Keep those feet looking and feeling amazing all year round.

How to Use Dissolve – Cure: Once your done enjoying your Jellie-Cure footbath, sprinkle approx. ¼ of the 2nd jar marked Dissolve – Cure all over the footbath filled with Jellie-Cure and add hot water.  Let it sit for a few minutes, your Jellie-Cure will start to dissolve, once it has returned to a liquid or semi liquid state flush the contents of the footbath down the drain. Always clean your footbath with a mild soap and hot water in between uses to ensure proper sanitation.

4th photo credits: http://www.thejediwife.blogspot.com/
